title: Central Square Three Bed in an UNBEATABLE location!
posting_body: Lovely, large 3 bed right in Central Sq!
Easy access to everything by foot, T, or car!
Renovated kitchen with a dishwasher, central air, and free laundry in the basement!
- Easy access to the Red Line
- Bonus storage room off of one of the bedrooms
Call or Text Michela Nionakis at 617-939-7425 for an immediate response!
